question: Which company has launched First Audio Service 'Suno' of india?
explanation: Audible, a part of e-commerce giant Amazon, on December 12 launched an India-first audio service \'Suno\'. Audible Suno - which will be available via a separate Android app - provides free and advertising-free access to hundreds of hours of original audio entertainment in Hindi and English. Suno includes more than 60 original and exclusive audio series available at launch.
